name: unsuccess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of someone or something not succeeding: When an author passes away, others often attempt to recreate the characters with varying degrees of unsuccess. The original target of 12 million visitors was over-optimistic, and has created the perception of unsuccess. Opposite
success
More examplesFewer examplesSuch was the unsuccess of Proust's first book that it remained a joke in the French literary world throughout his lifetime.I had already done two shows with spectacular unsuccess.The pressures within the modern nuclear family explain its dramatic unsuccess as a social unit.
